member.name: IDirectManipulationUpdateManager.RegisterWaitHandleCallback
member.summary: Registers a callback that is triggered by a handle.
member.param: The event handle that triggers the callback.
The event handler to call when the event is fired.
The unique ID of the event callback instance.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDirectManipulationUpdateManager.UnregisterWaitHandleCallback
member.param: The unique ID of the event callback instance.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDirectManipulationUpdateManager.Update
member.summary: Updates Direct Manipulation at the current time.
member.param: The frame info provider used to predict the position of the content and compensate for latency during composition.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Manages how compositor updates are sent to Direct Manipulation.
This interface enables the compositor to trigger an update on Direct Manipulation whenever there is a compositor update. The application should not call the methods of this interface directly.
